name: Sloth: Heart to Heart
detailed_description:
Japan, Kyushu Prefecture. 1969

Rouella Kromowidjojo is a genetic anomaly; a living dialysis machine who can cure almost all forms of disease through the process of crosstransfusion. For the next 15 hours, she will connect with her next patient: the mysterious Rei Fukugawa, whose emaciation and jaundice seems to hide something much more fatal.



Sloth: Heart to Heart is a short and casual Kinetic Visual Novel depicting the peculiar encounter of a doctor and her patient as they face the problem of one person having involuntary access to the emotions of another.

GAME FEATURES

♥ 3-4 Hours Of Gameplay

♥ 10+ High Quality CGs
♥ 10+ Ambient Soundtrack That Fits In Every Scene
♥ 3DCG Backgrounds That Changes Per Scene
♥ ...and More.



Don't forget to follow our store page!

Regards,
REi
